import React from 'react' import { Navigation } from './Navigation' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' function MyCardDetails() { const {eventName,location,price,picture,capacity}= useParams() const image = atob(picture) async function addService(){ } return (

Name: {eventName}

Location: {location}

Price : {price}

Capacity : {capacity}

) } export default MyCardDetails
